pageContext.description: Dimension: L 123.5 mm; We 39mm; Wbt 21.2mm; Bst 28.4mm; Blp 7.7mm; T sep 12.8mm; Tbt 4.0mm (approx),Typology: rounded fg. and stop crests, lump in other; approx rect. septum end; rather asym.  loop form,Manufacture: parts of cg. fl. stump, large and irregular - especially at top with lipping - much removed on blade sides; undulating furrow longt. stem one septum and depression in reverse - flow flaws? - also small notches in fg.?; well curved and bev. with hammer marks  - tending to split into 3 facets; blade tip hollow; little porosity in butt-end, and in one septum end.,Condition: butt end broken surface; edge all blunt - probably from corrosion.,Attached Material: light brown to fawn soil in a number of places.
pageContext.surface: Dark brown patina, mottled/rubbed to green in places; few scattered pocks to pale green, and flaking mainly at edge, to pale green and chocolate brown.
pageContext.remarks: Black ink: 567/11,Black ink printer: 567,Small rect. s/o label - printed: 11
